Header: SFHQ - KLN Troops Listen to Lecture
Content: Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi organized a ‘Human Rights’ lecture for Army personnel as a part of their training. Programme at the Nelum Piyasa auditorium under the guidance of Commander, Security Forces - Kilinochchi took place on Friday (16). It was conducted by Mr Rohitha Priyadharshana in the Human Rights Organization in Vavuniya. Brigadier D.M.L Chandrasiri, Brigadier General Staff Officer of the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi, Colonel General Staff Officer, Lieutenant Colonel K.H.N.P Hennadige together with 26 Officers and 440 Other Ranks attended the programme.
